home.title: Hola, soy Santiago
home.body: Diseñador gráfico, artista 3D, desarrollador web y videojuegos, y hobista profesional

about.title: Acerca de mí
about.body: [ESPAÑOL] Hello there! My name is Santiago Degetau, I am a twenty-something year old designer & developer living in Mexico. I have over five years of work experience in graphic design, more than two years of programming know-how and an unlimited drive to learn and improve every day.
